meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of Gatesville ISD, a portal to limitless possibilities, is to empower our students to be life-ready knowledge seekers and problem-solvers by instilling leadership, innovation, integrity, critical thinking, and service through challenging and engaging learning experiences facilitated by passionate teachers and supported by caring parents and community members.

div.h3: Gatesville ISD is now accepting online Free and Reduced Lunch Applications
div.div: Myschoolapps.com is the most secure way to process you child’s free and reduced application. Applications submitted online are processed within one to three days versus paper applications that can take up to 10 working days. Myschoolapps.com is also smart phone ready. Just type the web address in your browser, then enter your zip code, and state. Myschoolapps.com will walk you through the rest. The application is quick and easy. Most parents complete the app within 5 to 10 minutes. Please have all your information handy as once you leave the website, your information is deleted. For more information, contact Joyce Blanchard at 254-865-7251 ext. 5

div.a: Click here to start an application

div.div: Need help finding your student's bus route?

Early voting will occur from October 21st to November 1st. The 2019 proposed bond amount is $9.9 million that would result in a tax increase of $0.09 or an estimated $9.38 a month for a home valued at $150,000. The high school renovation and addition includes: 1. New cafeteria and kitchen 2. Main entrance, security vestibule, administration office 3. Classrooms, science lab, and collaboration spaces 4. Library / media room 5. Outdoor CTE and learning courtyard 6. Outdoor pavilion / common areas
For more information, click on this link GISD Bond 2019
